thread.title: Voxxers gonna Vox: Matt Yglesias blames refugees being homeless for rise in crime in Sweden
thread.title_full: Voxxers gonna Vox: Matt Yglesias blames refugees being homeless for rise in crime in Sweden

author: Sam J.
title: Voxxers gonna Vox: Matt Yglesias blames refugees being homeless for rise in crime in Sweden
text:
Voxxers gonna Vox: Matt Yglesias blames refugees being homeless for rise in crime in Sweden Posted at 10:16 am on February 21, 2017 by Sam J. 
Awww … so it’s SWEDEN’S fault that refugees are raping, rioting and committing more crime in general. 
Seems legit. Trump is dumb but lack of housing stock growth in Stockholm concentrates refugees in towns with with few jobs & it's a real problem. 
— Matthew Yglesias (@mattyglesias) February 21, 2017 
Yeah, it’s a real problem that Sweden took in a bunch of people who act like thugs, but let’s blame homelessness and not an extreme ideology that empowers them to act in such a way. 
Psh, c’mon Sweden, just build some cheap housing, hand out some food stamps and put them on government-sponsored healthcare and the violence will stop. 
*eye roll* Refugees being homeless causes rape, rioting and a rise in crime in Sweden. Didn't they have homes in their own country? @PolitiBunny https://t.co/2ttZzTmvVY 
— Andrew Young (@NucMM1retired) February 21, 2017 Trending
